thought: The website seems to be offering outdoor grills and other related products at unusually low prices, which is a characteristic of scam websites. Additionally, the website contains a lot of promotional language targeting the psychological weakness of wanting to get a good deal. There is also no information about the company and the privacy policy is not clearly stated. The URL https://www.grillsrabatt.com/ is a scam website.
